name: Downtown Drivers V 1.2
description:
This is a game about you being in an alternate universe where people drive the opposite way, but you need to get to work! Earn coins to get better cars!

Controls:

Click/Tap to select or confirm

A to move to the left

D to move to the right

That's really it, super simple yet hard.

Note: The images are from 1.1, not 1.2
